column4: is it possible to download the vmlinuz file alone and replace my corrupted vmlinuz ????? anyone help//
you can download the deb package and extract it
what was the command?
that's a very odd command
it copied 910_GL_STACK=1 into vmlinuz file.. and vmlinuz only now has this line
exactly
yeah, that would definitely make your system unbootable
ops must ban his ip
well, it's such an odd command I'm not sure it was malicious
it WAS malicious.. it replaced the contents of my working vmlinuz file :P ... and Jordan_U helped me to get the image installed.. and its downloading
well, yeah, it may have been malicious, I just wonder if he was very confused and trying to put the text somewhere else
he gave the same echo  and > to are_ee that broke his vmlinuz too
yeah, definitely seems suspicious
isnt > output redirection operator ??? :P ,,  it directed the output of echo into that file.. ha hah ah .. ! i know this already... but in a hurry..  i blinding posted his command into my terminal
that looks like a Linux build configuration line related to Intel video
then shall i try appending it now ? what do you think ?
don't touch your vmlinuz file
ok :P i have learnt that already.. he he
that string may be useful when you're configuring Linux to build it
i got my vmlinuz restored.. now in my 9.10 only
good
